Phoneme

Class PhonemeCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phoneme.PhonemeCreator

  • public class PhonemeCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    class used to convert graphemes to phonemes. calls SequiturG2P internally
    Author:
    7twiefel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      PhonemeDB pdb
      the public phoneme data base created for a predefined list of sentences or words

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhonemeCreator()
      creates a new phoneme creator.
      PhonemeCreator(java.lang.String sentenceFile)
      creates a new phoneme creator and caches the results for the list of sentences

      • PhonemeCreator

        public PhonemeCreator()
        creates a new phoneme creator. used when no precached results of a list of sentences should be loaded

      • getPhonemes

        public java.util.ArrayList<PhonemeContainer> getPhonemes(Result r)
        creates a list of phonemes corresponding to the list of results contained in r
        Parameters:
        r - Result received from a speech recognizer or postprocessor. needs to contain 1 result as string as a minimum
        Returns:
